name: What do vacuums dream?
description:
Have you ever wondered what a vacuum dreams of?
We neither, but we have made a game where you can at least let your automatic vacuums suck up endless amounts of trash in space.

However, the vacuums alone cannot throw out the trash fast enough. Fortunately, there is a console placed in the station that will let you access and adapt not only the code of your vacuums but also your own. Find cool synergies and build the most efficient vacuums you can to achieve a higher score.

This game was made for Major Jam 4.

Controls

  • Move with WASD
  • Jump with SPACE
  • Interact with E
  • Throw objects with LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

Team

  • Sandro Figo - Programmer (@sandrofigo)
  • Iris Trummer - Programmer
  • Elke Trummer - Artist (clockworkjellyfish)
